newsitem.title: USA: Lockheed, EDS, Andersen seek IRS contract.
newsitem.headline: Lockheed, EDS, Andersen seek IRS contract.

text.p: Lockheed Martin Corp, Electronic Data Systems Corp and Andersen Consulting said Thursday that they are teaming up in order to pursue a contract to overhaul the U.S. Internal Revenue Service's tax collecting computer system.
The companies said in a joint statement that they are going to pursue, together, the IRS's landmark tax modernization initiative launched this past May.
The statement said Lockheed Martin Federal Systems will lead the team, adding that the job will be one of the largest systems integration undertakings in the world.
